description:
Frieza’s victims have been wished back to life, but as they begin to rise, Goku falls - overwhelmed by Frieza’s devastating assault. Sensing his father’s defeat, Gohan rushes to the scene as the universe’s final hope.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku wa Son Gokuu no Musuko Da!! Gohan, Futatabi Kessen Jou e
Eu sou o filho de Goku! Gohan aparece novamente no campo de batalha
ผมคือลูกชายของซุนโกคู โกฮังกลับสู่ลานต่อสู้อีกครั้ง
ボクは孫悟空の息子だ!! 悟飯, 再び決戦場へ
